1.name: Â§aÂ§lTail Whip

Â§3â˜€ Â§7Area of Effect: Â§f3 Blocks Â§7(Circle-Shaped)

6.name: Â§aÂ§lLycan
6.description:
Â§7Letting your inner beast do the work.
Lycans use their animalistic features to come

7.name: Â§aÂ§lMain Weapon: Claws

Â§7Ferals let their instinct take control to deal

85.name: Â§cÂ§lInstinctive Charm
85.description:

Â§bInfatuated Â§dâ£Â§7 enemies deal Â§f-25% Â§7damage to

You will deal Â§f+5%Â§7 damage for every Â§bCombo Â§6Â©
Â§7you have.

87.name: Â§cÂ§lSigilomancy
87.description:
Â§7Â§nFurballÂ§7 becomes unnaffected by gravity, travels

Hitting an enemy directly with Â§7Â§nFurballÂ§7 will apply

Â§7Â§nFurballÂ§7 while shitfting will instead cycle between

Each enemy can only have a single Â§dSigilÂ§7 applied

Â§aâ¼ Â§7Range: Â§f+4 Blocks

Binded Â§dSigilsÂ§7 have their duration removed

128.name: Â§5Solicitor's Embodiment of Adoring Fondness
